sIntro.2: Experienced with different technologies we strive to build optimized product for each client.

sAboutUs.label: About Us
sAboutUs.text1: DEVMOTIV is web development business founded in 2021 by Matej Bošnjak, web developer with more than 5 years of working with web technologies. With interest in a wide variety of projects, DEVMOTIV is ready to tackle challenges and bring your projects to life. As technologies advance we can utilize web tech to build mobile or desktop applications as well.
sAboutUs.text2: To ensure quality of the project and development process, we rely on our six steps workflow. We offer flexibility of listening to your input during all steps of development process for additional changes or features.
sAboutUs.check1: Development with high quality and clean code
sAboutUs.check2: Supporting development communities with constructive input
sAboutUs.check3: Adding new technologies to our workbench whenever we can

sWorkflow.label: Workflow
sWorkflow.title: We organize our workflow per six development steps

s1.title: Gathering information
s1.text: Gathering information from a client about the project to identify their needs and provide the best solution for them.

s2.title: Project planning
s2.text: Based on gathered information, planning of project areas and subareas comes in motion to build proper navigational system.

s3.title: Design
s3.text: By building one or more design prototypes and including the client in some of the workflow tasks we ensure that project meets all requirements.

s4.title: Development
s4.text: Process of development functional project while meeting all standards requirements. Implementing technologies that would be best suited for your project.

s5.title: Testing, Review, and Launch
s5.text: Testing functionality, compatibility, desing and performance to ensure that the website is ready for the launch in production.

s6.title: Maintenance
s6.text: Post launch tasks per user's feedback, support and maintenance.

sServices.title: Our services
sServices.subTitle: By relying on our workbench technologies we ensure that your project is optimised, scalable and properly structured with high quality code

s1.title: WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT
s1.description: Beautiful and responsive design with SEO optimization

s2.title: WEB APP DEVELOPMENT
s2.description: High quality, clean and secure code while meeting all programming standards.

s3.title: SEO OPTIMIZATION
s3.description: Implementing SEO optimization for your new or existing project

s4.title: SUPPORT AND ENHANCEMENT
s4.description: Resolving technical support issues and making improvements after implementation per request

s5.title: MOBILE AND DESKTOP APPS
s5.description: We can utilize web technologies to create stuning mobile or desktop applications

s6.title: DATABASE IMPLEMENTATION
s6.description: Enhancing your new or existing project with database or custom CMS

sContactUs.title: We will be glad to hear from you!

privacyPolicy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacyPolicy.genInfo: This policy covers the collection and use of information obtained through the website on which this notice appears. If you have questions or complaints regarding our privacy notice or practices, please contact us via e-mail which is provided on this website.

personalInfoCollected.title: Personal Information Collected
personalInfoCollected.text: DEVMOTIV collects personal info through this website in order to communicate with current and/or potential clients, current and/or future business partners and others interested parties.

collectables.info: Personal information we may collect include:
collectables.name: Name
collectables.other: Other information you voluntarily send through this website

infoUse.title: Use of Personal Information
infoUse.text: On this website we collect personal information through contact form. Collected personal information we use only to contact directly with you. We will not use it for direct private communication unless you specifically ask for this type of communication or content of your message indicates a proper reply should be sent as a response.

accessInfo.title: Access to Information
accessInfo.text: Whenever we collect your personal information, we take steps to ensure that it is accurate, complete and up-to-date. If your personal information changes, or if you no longer want to communicate with us, you may ask us to find out which information we have about you, and to correct, update, amend, or delete any or all information by contacting us via contact form on this website or directly on e-mail which is provided on this website.

other.title: Other technologies and additional information
other.text: Our website includes links to DEVMOTIV social media accounts on Facebook and LinkedIn. Our website includes link to a blog we have on Hashnode. We do not collect any of your information you post through comments on our blog posts nor we collect any of your information by your interaction with any of mentioned links. If you submit personal information to any of those sites, their use of your information is governed by their respective privacy policies.
